headline: Realty Income Jumps After May Jobs Report Sparks Optimism for REIT Valuations
summary: If you’re staring at Realty Income’s stock right now and wondering if now is your moment to buy, hold, or move on, you’re not alone. Lately, Realty Income has captured attention for more reasons than just its collection of properties and famous monthly dividend. In the last week, shares have climbed 2.9%, and they’re up a solid 14.0% since the start of the year. While those short-term gains are impressive, it’s worth noting that over the last twelve months, the stock has actually dipped by...
